channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Oxy is Cloudflare's Rust-based next generation proxy framework (2023)
item.description:
Picture a server (like NGINX, that reader might be familiar with) that can proxy traffic with an array of protocols, including various predefined common traffic flow scenarios that enable you to route traffic to specific destinations or even egress with a different protocol than the one used for ingress. If you've used Cloudflare Workers before, then you should be familiar with this extensibility model. On-ramps On-ramp defines a combination of transport layer socket type and protocols that server listeners can use for ingress traffic.

Read more
